verses.verse: "Then <WG5119> the kingdom <WG932> of heaven <WG3772> will be comparable <WG3666> to ten <WG1176> virgins, <WG3933> who <WG3748> took <WG2983> their lamps, <WG2985> and went <WG1831> out to meet <WG5222> the bridegroom. <WG3566>
"And five <WG4002> of them were foolish, <WG3474> and five <WG4002> were prudent. <WG5429>
"For when the foolish <WG3474> took <WG2983> their lamps, <WG2985> they took <WG2983> no <WG3756> oil <WG1637> with them,
but the prudent <WG5429> took <WG2983> oil <WG1637> in flasks <WG30> along with their lamps. <WG2985>
"Now <WG1161> while the bridegroom <WG3566> was delaying, <WG5549> they all <WG3956> got <WG3573> drowsy <WG3573> and [began] to sleep. <WG2518>
"But at midnight <WG3319> <WG3571> there was a shout, <WG2906> 'Behold, <WG2400> the bridegroom! <WG3566> Come <WG1831> out to meet <WG529> [him.']
"Then <WG5119> all <WG3956> those <WG1565> virgins <WG3933> rose, <WG1453> and trimmed <WG2885> their lamps. <WG2985>
"And the foolish <WG3474> said <WG3004> to the prudent, <WG5429> 'Give <WG1325> us some <WG1537> of your oil, <WG1637> for our lamps <WG2985> are going <WG4570> out.'

"But the prudent <WG5429> answered, <WG611> saying, <WG3004> 'No, <WG3379> there will not be enough <WG714> for us and you [too;] go <WG4198> instead <WG3123> to the dealers <WG4453> and buy <WG59> [some] for yourselves. <WG1438>'

"And while they were going <WG565> away <WG565> to make <WG59> the purchase, <WG59> the bridegroom <WG3566> came, <WG2064> and those <WG3588> who were ready <WG2092> went <WG1525> in with him to the wedding <WG1062> feast; <WG1062> and the door <WG2374> was shut. <WG2808>
"And later <WG5305> the other <WG3062> virgins <WG3933> also <WG2532> came, <WG2064> saying, <WG3004> 'Lord, <WG2962> lord, <WG2962> open <WG455> up for us.'
"But he answered <WG611> and said, <WG3004> 'Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, I do not know <WG3609> you.'
"Be on the alert <WG1127> then, <WG3767> for you do not know <WG3609> the day <WG2250> nor <WG3761> the hour. <WG5610>

"For [it is] just <WG5618> like <WG5618> a man <WG444> [about] to go <WG589> on a journey, <WG589> who called <WG2564> his own <WG2398> slaves, <WG1401> and entrusted <WG3860> his possessions <WG5225> to them.

"And to one <WG3739> he gave <WG1325> five <WG4002> talents, <WG5007> to another, <WG3739> <WG1161> two, <WG1417> and to another, <WG3739> <WG1161> one, <WG1520> each <WG1538> according <WG2596> to his own <WG2398> ability; <WG1411> and he went <WG589> on his journey. <WG589>
"Immediately <WG2112> the one who had received <WG2983> the five <WG4002> talents <WG5007> went <WG4198> and traded <WG2038> with them, and gained <WG2770> five <WG4002> more <WG243> talents.
"In the same <WG5615> manner <WG5615> the one who [had received] the two <WG1417> [talents] gained <WG2770> two <WG1417> more. <WG243>
"But he who received <WG2983> the one <WG1520> [talent] went <WG565> away <WG565> and dug <WG3736> in the ground, <WG1093> and hid <WG2928> his master's money. <WG694>
"Now <WG1161> after <WG3326> a long <WG4183> time <WG5550> the master <WG2962> of those <WG1565> slaves <WG1401> came <WG2064> and settled <WG4868> accounts <WG3056> with them.

"And the one who had received <WG2983> the five <WG4002> talents <WG5007> came <WG4334> up and brought <WG4374> five <WG4002> more <WG243> talents, <WG5007> saying, <WG3004> 'Master, <WG2962> you entrusted <WG3860> five <WG4002> talents <WG5007> to me; see, <WG2396> I have gained <WG2770> five <WG4002> more <WG243> talents. <WG5007>'

"His master <WG2962> said <WG5346> to him, 'Well <WG2095> done, <WG2095> good <WG18> and faithful <WG4103> slave; <WG1401> you were faithful <WG4103> with a few <WG3641> things, <WG3641> I will put <WG2525> you in charge <WG2525> of many <WG4183> things, <WG4183> enter <WG1525> into the joy <WG5479> of your master. <WG2962>'

"The one <WG3588> also <WG2532> who <WG3588> [had received] the two <WG1417> talents <WG5007> came <WG4334> up and said, <WG3004> 'Master, <WG2962> you entrusted <WG3860> to me two <WG1417> talents; <WG5007> see, <WG2396> I have gained <WG2770> two <WG1417> more <WG243> talents. <WG5007>'

"His master <WG2962> said <WG5346> to him, 'Well <WG2095> done, <WG2095> good <WG18> and faithful <WG4103> slave; <WG1401> you were faithful <WG4103> with a few <WG3641> things, <WG3641> I will put <WG2525> you in charge <WG2525> of many <WG4183> things; <WG4183> enter <WG1525> into the joy <WG5479> of your master. <WG2962>'

"And the one also <WG2532> who had received <WG2983> the one <WG1520> talent <WG5007> came <WG4334> up and said, <WG3004> 'Master, <WG2962> I knew <WG1097> you to be a hard <WG4642> man, <WG444> reaping <WG2325> where <WG3699> you did not sow, <WG4687> and gathering <WG4863> where <WG3606> you scattered <WG1287> no <WG3756> [seed.]
'And I was afraid, <WG5399> and went <WG565> away <WG565> and hid <WG2928> your talent <WG5007> in the ground; <WG1093> see, <WG2396> you have <WG2192> what <WG3588> is yours. <WG4674>'

"But his master <WG2962> answered <WG611> and said <WG3004> to him, 'You wicked, <WG4190> lazy <WG3636> slave, <WG1401> you knew <WG3609> that I reap <WG2325> where <WG3699> I did not sow, <WG4687> and gather <WG4863> where <WG3606> I scattered <WG1287> no <WG3756> [seed.]
'Then <WG3767> you ought <WG1163> to have put <WG906> my money <WG694> in the bank, <WG5133> and on my arrival <WG2064> I would have received <WG2865> my [money] back <WG2865> with interest. <WG5110>
'Therefore <WG3767> take <WG142> away <WG142> the talent <WG5007> from him, and give <WG1325> it to the one who has <WG2192> the ten <WG1176> talents. <WG5007>'

"For to everyone <WG3956> who has <WG2192> shall [more] be given, <WG1325> and he shall have <WG4052> an abundance; <WG4052> but from the one who does not have, <WG2192> even <WG2532> what <WG3739> he does have <WG2192> shall be taken <WG142> away. <WG142>

"And cast <WG1544> out the worthless <WG888> slave <WG1401> into the outer <WG1857> darkness; <WG4655> in that place <WG1563> there <WG1563> shall be weeping <WG2805> and gnashing <WG1030> of teeth. <WG3599>

"But when <WG3752> the Son <WG5207> of Man <WG444> comes <WG2064> in His glory, <WG1391> and all <WG3956> the angels <WG32> with Him, then <WG5119> He will sit <WG2523> on His glorious <WG1391> throne. <WG2362>

"And all <WG3956> the nations <WG1484> will be gathered <WG4863> before <WG1715> Him; and He will separate <WG873> them from one <WG240> another, <WG240> as the shepherd <WG4166> separates <WG873> the sheep <WG4263> from the goats; <WG2056>
and He will put <WG2476> the sheep <WG4263> on His right, <WG1188> and the goats <WG2055> on the left. <WG2176>

"Then <WG5119> the King <WG935> will say <WG3004> to those <WG3588> on His right, <WG1188> 'Come, <WG1205> you who are blessed <WG2127> of My Father, <WG3962> inherit <WG2816> the kingdom <WG932> prepared <WG2090> for you from the foundation <WG2602> of the world. <WG2889>

'For I was hungry, <WG3983> and you gave <WG1325> Me [something] to eat; <WG2068> I was thirsty, <WG1372> and you gave <WG4222> Me drink; <WG4222> I was a stranger, <WG3581> and you invited <WG4863> Me in;
naked, <WG1131> and you clothed <WG4016> Me; I was sick, <WG770> and you visited <WG1980> Me; I was in prison, <WG5438> and you came <WG2064> to Me.'

"Then <WG5119> the righteous <WG1342> will answer <WG611> Him, saying, <WG3004> 'Lord, <WG2962> when <WG4219> did we see <WG3708> You hungry, <WG3983> and feed <WG5142> You, or <WG2228> thirsty, <WG1372> and give <WG4222> You drink <WG4222>?
'And when <WG4219> did we see <WG3708> You a stranger, <WG3581> and invite <WG4863> You in, or <WG2228> naked, <WG1131> and clothe <WG4016> You?
'And when <WG4219> did we see <WG3708> You sick, <WG770> or <WG2228> in prison, <WG5438> and come <WG2064> to You?'

"And the King <WG935> will answer <WG611> and say <WG3004> to them, 'Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, to the extent <WG1909> <WG3745> that you did <WG4160> it to one <WG1520> of these <WG3778> brothers <WG80> of Mine, <WG1473> [even] the least <WG1646> [of them,] you did <WG4160> it to Me.'

"Then <WG5119> He will also <WG2532> say <WG3004> to those <WG3588> on His left, <WG2176> 'Depart <WG4198> from Me, accursed <WG2672> ones, into the eternal <WG166> fire <WG4442> which has been prepared <WG2090> for the devil <WG1228> and his angels; <WG32>
for I was hungry, <WG3983> and you gave <WG1325> Me [nothing <WG3756>] to eat; <WG2068> I was thirsty, <WG1372> and you gave <WG4222> Me nothing to drink; <WG4222>
I was a stranger, <WG3581> and you did not invite <WG4863> Me in; naked, <WG1131> and you did not clothe <WG4016> Me; sick, <WG772> and in prison, <WG5438> and you did not visit <WG1980> Me.'

"Then <WG5119> they themselves <WG846> also <WG2532> will answer, <WG611> saying, <WG3004> 'Lord, <WG2962> when <WG4219> did we see <WG3708> You hungry, <WG3983> or <WG2228> thirsty, <WG1372> or <WG2228> a stranger, <WG3581> or <WG2228> naked, <WG1131> or <WG2228> sick, <WG772> or <WG2228> in prison, <WG5438> and did not take <WG1247> care <WG1247> of You?'

"Then <WG5119> He will answer <WG611> them, saying, <WG3004> 'Truly <WG281> I say <WG3004> to you, to the extent <WG1909> <WG3745> that you did <WG4160> not do <WG4160> it to one <WG1520> of the least <WG1646> of these, <WG3778> you did <WG4160> not do <WG4160> it to Me.'
"And these <WG3778> will go <WG565> away <WG565> into eternal <WG166> punishment, <WG2851> but the righteous <WG1342> into eternal <WG166> life. <WG2222>"
